body_html:
Thanks I saw it was just added, just wasn't sure of the status.

Using Experiment with Keras models does sound good. The other way around may also be useful as an option, where if you already have training code for Model.fit() and an existing TFRecord dataset.

body:
Thanks I saw it was just added, just wasn't sure of the status.

Using `Experiment` with Keras models does sound good. The other way around may also be useful as an option, where if you already have training code for `Model.fit()` and an existing TFRecord dataset.
